name: name
description: the name of this monitor (if any)

name: nRecords
description: the number of appearances for this monitor

name: fileSize
description: the size of this monitor on disc

name: isEmpty
description: true if the monitor has no appearances

name: deleted
description: if this monitor has been deleted, `false` otherwise

name: isStaged
description: if the monitor file in on the stage, `false` otherwise
